parameters.name: free_rent
parameters.description: 1 will show only free cars if option is enabled

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Latitude coordinate of car (must be used in combination with longitude)

parameters.name: lng
parameters.description: Longitude coordinate of car (must be used in combination with Latitude)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
5=Nearby, selected for you
4=Lowest price (all vehicles)
3=Nearby, selected for you
2=Near by (all vehicles)
1=Lowest price with pictures
0=Near by with lowest price and picture

parameters.name: from_m
parameters.description: If set it will overwrite minutes from from_h

parameters.name: to_m
parameters.description: If set it will overwrite minutes from to_h

parameters.name: location_id
parameters.description: Location id if set will overwrite city

parameters.name: gps_unit_active
parameters.description: If set 1 only cars with gps_unit_active will show

parameters.name: with_picture
parameters.description: If set 1 Show only car with picture

200.description: List of cars based on search query

parameters.name: numberplate
parameters.description: The registration number of your vehicle

parameters.name: make
parameters.description: The make of your vehicle, ie. 'Toyota'

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: The model of your vehicle, ie. 'Prius'

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: The year your vehicle was made

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: Color of the vehicle, see GET /api/index/colors

parameters.name: passangers
parameters.description: Please specify the total number of people that your vehicle can carry, including the driver

parameters.name: fuels_type_id
parameters.description: Choose the fuel type that your vehicle uses (ID of fuel type, look Fuels Types for details)

parameters.name: transmissions_type_id
parameters.description: Choose the type of transmission in your vehicle, GET /api/index/transmissions

parameters.name: maximum_distance_id
parameters.description: If you wish to set a maximum distance your vehicle is allowed to travel away in a radius from the pick-up location, not a maximum of kilometers for the rental period. All vehicles are rented out with unlimited kilometers, see GET /api/index/maximum-distances

parameters.name: insurance_type_id
parameters.description: Please specify type of insurance on the vehicle, GET /api/index/insurance-types

parameters.name: vehicle_rent_out_id
parameters.description: Vehicle rent out (ID of vehicle rent out, look Vehicle Rent Out for details)

parameters.name: one_way_rentals
parameters.description:
Choose if you allow your vehicle to be left
    somewhere other than at the pick-up location.
    MyCarYourRental will arrange the transport back
    for the vehicle at the renters cost
    (1=Yes,0=No)

parameters.name: minimum_age
parameters.description: Please select if you have a minimum age requirement (0=Everybody)

parameters.name: licence_requirement_id
parameters.description: Please select if you require a minimum level for licence (ID of licence requirements, see GET /api/index/licence-requirements

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: In the unlikely event that our insurance company should replace your vehicle, what would you estimate the value to be? Please note: The estimate is no guarantee, just a guideline for us to place your vehicle in the right insurance category

parameters.name: c_o_f
parameters.description: Does your vehicle have a CoF or WoF(0=CoF,1=WoF,2=None)

parameters.name: towbar
parameters.description: Does your vehicle have a towbar (0=No,1=Yes)

parameters.name: nickname
parameters.description: Does your car have a nickname?

parameters.name: dates_unavailable[date][]
parameters.description: Date when car is unavailable, ISO 8601 datetime

parameters.name: dates_unavailable[from_time][]
parameters.description: Time from when car is unavailable (start of day 00:00:00). Its used in combination with dates_unavailable[date][].

parameters.name: dates_unavailable[to_time][]
parameters.description: Time to when car is unavailable, (end of day 24:00:00). Its used in combination with dates_unavailable[date][].

parameters.name: bookings_response_time_id
parameters.description: Response time to booking (ID of booking reposnse times, see GET /api/index/bookings-response-times

parameters.name: instant_extend
parameters.description: Extension of booking, instatly or manually, 0=Manually, 1=Instant

parameters.name: minimals_rentals_period_id
parameters.description: Minimum period that you would like to receive bookings, GET /api/index/minimals-rentals-periods

parameters.name: can_admin_change_price
parameters.description: Allow MyCarYourRental.com to adjust prices according to suggestion (0=No, 1=Yes)

parameters.name: from_m
parameters.description: If set it will overwrite minutes from from_h

parameters.name: to_m
parameters.description: If set it will overwrite minutes from to_h

parameters.name: view
parameters.description:
'all' for rental and booking
'booking' for only booking
'rental' for only rental

parameters.name: status[]
parameters.description: 0=created, 1=declined by owner, 2=Cancelled by renter, 3=accepted by owner, 4=time execeeded (pass the from time), 5=return of car is confirmed by owner, 7=enquiry

parameters.name: sort_type
parameters.description:
booking_date=sort based on booking datetime searched (default created, if from date is searched the is sorted on from field)
most_recent_activity=based on lastest activity on booking

parameters.name: booking_time_operator
parameters.description: created, from and to query mysql operator ('>' is 'gt','>=' is 'gte', '=' is 'eq','<' is 'lt','<=' is 'lte')

parameters.description: Search location, needed for calculation of distance, Lat and Lng can be used instead
